entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022
